channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lack of speed limit signs, 10th May
item.description:
This section of the old Evesham road has a 30mph speed limit, indicated by lights. Most drivers seem to think it is a 60mph limit as there are no signs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: This tree (probably dead) is gradually leaning lower and lower across the Cotswold Way. I recently had a report of a walker cutting their head on it., 10th May
item.description:
It is approximately half way between Corndean Lane and Vineyard Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe

item.title: Car drove over signage, 9th May
item.description:
